description: Invokes the AlgoSec SOAP command update_user
name: afa_update_user

connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a AlgoSec server.

domain.description: Optional override of the AlgoSec domain in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

password.description: Optional override of the AlgoSec password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

port.description: Optional override of the AlgoSec port in <connection>.

server.description: Optional override of the AlgoSec server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

session_id.description: Login session cookie. If empty then username/password will be used to login prior to running this operation

transport.description: Optional override of the AlgoSec transport in <connection>.

user_password.description: New password to update the user

username.description: Optional override of the AlgoSec username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).

wsdl_endpoint.description: Optional override of the AlgoSec wsdl_endpoint in <connection>.
